clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy Study of GEMOX Combination and Vinorelbine in NSCL Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Clinical Trial With the Combination Gemcitabine, Oxaliplatin and Vinorelbine as First Line Treatment in Patients With Non-small Cell Bronchopulmonary Cancer

brief_summary.textblock:
Primary:
·To evaluate the activity of the combination of gemcitabine, oxaliplatin and vinorelbine as first line treatment in patients with non-small cell bronchopulmonary cancer
Secondary:
·To evaluate the toxicity of the combination

primary_outcome.measure: Objective rate of response (ORR) according to the RECIST criterion, as evaluated by a review panel of outside experts.
